reviews.review: Portal is a great game to play, however the game is a bit short and doesn't have a lot of puzzles to work with. But it is a good game. 9.5/10

One of the best foils ever for a puzzle game. If you were born earlier than say 1975... some levels do require a bit of quickness as your are flying discombobulated through the air... might be a deal killer ya. The sarcasm and world created is fun, the puzzles are enjoyable and all in all this is a great game.

Leider hatte ich nur eine Spielzeit von 2,5 Stunden, diese waren aber absolut ein Genuss. Zu empfehlen ist vorallem der Nachgänger Portal 2. Dort war das Spiel absolut Sensationell.

Portal is a game where you solve a whole bunch of puzzles using portals. Your basically locked in each room/level until you figure out when/where/how to place the portals to allow you to bypass the obstacles. It's really fun and makes you think. It's challenging for many but a bit to easy for me though. ; )

今天一口气通关了，真的很震撼，短短几个小时的流程每分每秒都值得回味。通过自己的思考与行动来过关简直太爽，最后摧毁glados的瞬间产生了一种成就感，望着各种曾阻挠过我的部件被破坏成零碎，这种成就感伴随着我直到游戏落幕，可当歌声响起时不知道为什么，我被打动了。。。
“她”真的准备了蛋糕...

2.8小时通关。
作为一个P2刷过六次的玩家，P1的难度确实相比较P2来说低了很多，从出门到最后boss基本没遇到大的障碍。不像P2里面一关可能会用半小时...
BOSS战居然和2代基本一样。。。但感觉比2代难一些。G姐来回晃，扔进去最后一个球的时候只剩30秒了。
但作为一部11年前的游戏，进入的界面看起来还像CS1.6一样的游戏，无论是题材，内容，BGM还是墙上的 “The cake is a lie.” 都别具一格。还是我最爱的游戏的前作。她无论如何都是出色的。
另外，我不晕3D，也不恐高。但玩这种游戏还是紧张有时候起一身鸡皮疙瘩。这难道就是幽闭恐惧症？
This game is timeless.
Bought this during the July Steam Sales, definitely worth it! Challenging levels and witty characters.

Muy buen juego, aun que no me duro tanto y aunque ya tiene su tiempo hay cosas que debo decir.

-Increible historia 
-Puzzles bueno pero muy faciles (en mi opinion cada quien aprende diferente)
-Los retos te daran un buen desafio
-Jugabilidad muy buena
-Es un juego de puzzles pero tiene jefe final :v
-No encontre bugs, en su defensa dire que los que puedes encontrar son causados por el jugador gracias a la pistola de portales

En mi opinion Portal es un magnifico juego del cual te vas enterando de su verdadera historia poco a poco pero es muy atrapante y te dan ganas de seguir jugando hasta terminarlo, Obra maestra.

9.8/10

Un juego realmente precioso (uno de mis favoritos), humilde, pero gratificante, lleno de carisma y alma, muy efectiva, y con lo mejor del Videojuego, su Villana, "GLaDOS", Esplendida, una de mis villanas favoritas.
Muy recomendable y al dia de hoy sigue siendo genial, Narrativamente es precioso, no lo se, no me alcanzaria las palabras para describir lo bueno que es este Juego, tiene sus pifias, si, como todo, no es perfecto, pero esta a pequeños paso de serlo.
Su Soundtrack es muy bello, Graficamente se ve bonito, algunas cosas envejecieron un poquito, su estetica siempre me parecio muy genial, caracteristico y hasta llega a ser Carismatico, pero se sigue viendo bien, el diseño de niveles Ingenioso, muy trabajado, Narrativamente es espectaular, como VALVe nos tiene acostumbrados, y bueno, las fisicas, usadas de manera perfecta y pulidas al maximo.
Es cortito, eso si, a mi la primera vez me habra tomado no lo se, 5 horas a lo mucho, pero ya la segunda vez solo me tomo 2, para volver a reseñarlo, me tomo una hora y media o 2 mas o menos, igual, a lo que su durabilidad recae en su dificultad en su mayoria, cuanto te cuesta resolver cada puzzle, pero desde ya, son de esas historias que no necesitan alargarse, es justa, y muy placentera.
THE CAKE IS A TRUTH! <3
very fantastic!

La manera de ser de Glados le da un carisma demasiado bueno la verdad al juego y a la historia de fondo (Gracias a dios en Portal 2 ella sigue estando y la conocemos aun mas)

Recomendado para todos

So I was sitting out in the living room on my computer, wondering what I should play. I didn't have much time either before I had to go somewhere. So I see portal sitting there because I had bought the valve collection during the summer sale. I launch portal and I'm met with these braindead puzzles that take me 30 seconds to complete. To a normal human these puzzles could take them hours. I felt like an intellectual genius, I solved puzzle after puzzle after puzzle. A game has never stroked my ego this hard before, but before I knew it, the game was over lol. I was just trying to play through it casually and I beat it in one sitting. Can't wait for portal 2, I heard it was longer and more challenging. But other than that, this is a really good game. 10/10
One of the best games I have ever played! It combines adventure and puzzles in a perfect way, while keeping the story interesting and simple. Totally recommended!
juste un peux court. Sinon il frole la perfection

I'll rate this a perfect 10.

Also, the end credit music is pure awesomeness! Gave me goosebumps. Looking forward for Portal 2 and possible sequels!
O jogo da Valve de puzzle tão famoso como é excelente. Divertido, engraçado e certos momentos desafiador. Indispensável para todos que gostam de games.

我是先买2,之后才买的1,比较的话,我是非常不推荐1的

原因如下:
1.流程,剧情都较短
2.win10玩的时候,有点小bug
3.能量球诡异的弹道,2代的激光不知道比它高到哪里去了...
4.主线难度偏低偏低偏低,高级图17和18又难的令人发指


这种难度是恶心我的难度,完全不是逻辑步骤上的难度,而是某些刻意安排的小细节上的难度,这种刻意安排的小细节难度无疑会浪费你大量时间且给你带来挫败感
例如
高级图17中你需要拿个 球蹲着来反弹能量球
高级图18要在开场一闪而过的空中射出下一个传送门(对比2代的话,2代滞空时间明显更长)

2代关卡我不看攻略花点时间自己想出来,最后心里会想"哇,原来是这样"
1代关卡我不得不看攻略,最后心里会想"v社你有毒吧,这么设计"

因此有2代的朋友没必要去尝试1代,没买的朋友也应该直接入2代

I made 2 portals so I could see the back of my head.

Overall a nice 9/10.

Ich spiele für das Erlebnis und Portal war eine wirklich großartige Erfahrung... aber für mich als Mensch mit Motion-Sickness ist das Spiel auch eine große Herausforderung gewesen. 

Einerseits sind die Spielemechaniken so gut umgesetz und die Rätsel sehr kreativ, teilweise sogar richtig knifflig anderseits gibt es Rätsel bei denen man wie wild umhergeschleudert wird und bei denen einem ungelogen richtig schlecht wird. Mit genug Pausen sollten es aber die meisten auf die Reihe bekommen. An manchen Stellen ist das Game wirklich sehr frustrierend aber es ist eines der games die es Wert sind und zur Belohnung wird man kontinuierlich von GLaDOS verarscht und oder beleidigt <3. Absolute Kauf- und Spieleempfehlung.
great game
good

Considering I’ve watched various gameplays in the past and had many friends who played the game, also the fact that it’s been out for so long, you’d think it’d be easy for me to beat the game. Nope. After all that it still provided a good challenge for me and was worth the buy in the end. It was a fun experience and I’m glad I finally added the game to my library. 10/10 time to play Portal 2

Portal may go down in history as the forefather of the FPS puzzle genre, and the biggest puzzle video game that actually got anyone's attention. If you didn't know, Portal is a game where you are given a devices that shoots portals onto surfaces, and you must make your way through a sci-fi laboratory, finishing test courses and getting past deadly obstacles as the AI gets progressively homicidal.

The gameplay is exceptional, once again the only puzzle game I even really care about, which is amazing in this day and age of most genres and shooters. They've not only made a shooter puzzle game, but made it better than most other shooters on the market anyways. The game has lots of good brainteasers, and in the midst of it all, has some of the best script in the background you'll hear for some time. Seriously, they somehow make an entertaining, engaging, and dark villian in a puzzle game. It's awe-inspiring.

Portal's graphics... aren't so bad. They're late 2000's source, so while not amazing, they've aged well enough. Portal doesn't have music. Except the credits, and it's excellent.

Portal is an amazing puzzle game made by Valve in its prime, and it earns every title it was given. The gameplay is excellent and full of creative and tricky puzzles, while the script carries you along and is somehow mind-bogglingly good for, again, a puzzle game. The game had no right to be as good as it is... and yet to this day it has done exceptionally in every way. And I agree. 9/10.
